item.title: Tesla-Managed Thirty-Party Owned Supercharger Opens In Florida
item.description: The supercharger location, comprising eight stalls, is owned by a third party but managed by Tesla.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin Falling? Ethereum Leads Losses While Zcash Gains Amid Nearly $1 Billion Liquidations
item.description: Bitcoin’s price dropped to $86,700 after a stronger-than-expected September jobs report.

item.title: CRNC Stock Sees Strongest Intraday Surge In Over 10 Months After Q4 Revenue Tops Estimates
item.description: Goldman Sachs raised Cerence’s price target to $11 from $10 while maintaining a ‘Neutral’ rating, according to TheFly.

item.title: Praxis Precision Medicines Stock Drops After Culper Research Reveals Short Position
item.description: The firm alleged that Praxis “gamed” the data from its late-stage trial of Ulixacaltamide in essential tremor.

item.title: HBO Renews Two ‘Game of Thrones’ Franchise Series Through 2028
item.description: HBO said that “A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms” has been renewed for a second season, ahead of the first season debut in January next year.
